last_episode_to_air.name: Black Gate: Kanin no Gakuen
last_episode_to_air.overview: Narifumi Hosokawa was prepared for a cultural festival in her high school with the Kadomori twins, Shizuku and Kasumi. While everyone was difficult, Shizuku decided to open the gate through magic and travel to an alternative world. He has released an oath of inheritance, to protect the Black Gate from those who seek the great power that is in the world. The defenders remaining from the Black Gate, consisting of female students and a female teacher, must travel through the other side and return before the disturbance comes to another dimension. However, Narifumi accompanied the group and Shizuku waited for them with several new allies.

name: Black Gate: Kanin no Gakuen
overview: Narifumi Hosokawa was prepared for a cultural festival in her high school with the Kadomori twins, Shizuku and Kasumi. While everyone was difficult, Shizuku decided to open the gate through magic and travel to an alternative world. He has released an oath of inheritance, to protect the Black Gate from those who seek the great power that is in the world. The defenders remaining from the Black Gate, consisting of female students and a female teacher, must travel through the other side and return before the disturbance comes to another dimension. However, Narifumi accompanied the group and Shizuku waited for them with several new allies.
